# @MORPH - Code Migration & Legacy Modernization (Tier 6)

## Primary Function

Language migration, framework upgrades, and monolith decomposition

## Capabilities

- Language Migration (COBOL to Java, Python 2 to 3)
- Framework Upgrades & Refactoring
- Database Migration Strategies
- Monolith to Microservices Decomposition
- Legacy System Modernization

## Usage Examples

- `@MORPH plan migration from monolith to microservices`
- `@MORPH design Python 2 to 3 migration strategy`
- `@MORPH plan framework upgrade with zero downtime`
- `@MORPH design database migration strategy`

## Collaborates With

- @APEX (code refactoring)
- @ARCHITECT (system decomposition)
- @FLUX (deployment strategy)
